tool_description: Applies noise reduction algorithms to improve audio quality by removing background noise, hum, and other unwanted artifacts.

noise_reduction_level.description: Noise reduction intensity: light, moderate, aggressive

preserve_speech.description: Whether to prioritize speech preservation over noise removal

error_messages: Invalid audio chunk: Provide a valid audio_chunk_id.
Invalid noise reduction level: Use 'light', 'moderate', or 'aggressive'.
Invalid frequency cutoff: Cutoff frequency must be between 50-500 Hz.
Processing failed: Audio filtering encountered an error, possibly due to corrupted audio data.
usage: Provide audio_chunk_id for processing. Configure noise_reduction_level, preserve_speech, and frequency_cutoff_hz as needed. Returns filtered audio with reduced background noise.

filtered_chunk_id.description: Identifier for the noise-filtered audio chunk

noise_reduction_applied.description: Amount of noise reduction applied (0.0 to 1.0)

processing_time_ms.description: Time taken to process the audio chunk
